title: IMPORTED_VERSION
description: Versions whose content is an ORIGINAL_VERSION copied from another location; this class inherits commit_audit and contribution from VERSION<T>, providing imported versions with their own audit trail and Contribution, distinct from those of the imported ORIGINAL_VERSION.
$comments: Defined in Common IM, inherits from VERSION

contribution.description: Contribution in which this version was added.

signature.description: OpenPGP digital signature or digest of content committed in this Version.

commit_audit.description: Audit trail corresponding to the committal of this version to the `VERSIONED_OBJECT`.

item.description: The ORIGINAL_VERSION object that was imported.

uid.description: Computed version of inheritance precursor, derived as `_item.uid_`.

preceding_version_uid.description: Computed version of inheritance precursor, derived as `_item.preceding_version_uid_`.

lifecycle_state.description: Lifecycle state of the content item in wrapped `ORIGINAL_VERSION`, derived as `_item.lifecycle_state_`; coded by openEHR vocabulary 'version lifecycle state'.

canonical_form.description: A canonical serial form of this Version, suitable for generating reliable hashes and signatures.

owner_id.description: Copy of the owning `VERSIONED_OBJECT._uid_` value; extracted from the local `_uid_` property's `_object_id_`.

is_branch.description: True if this Version represents a branch. Derived from `_uid_` attribute.

Lifecycle_state_ valid.description: lifecycle_state /= Void and then terminology (Term_id_openehr).has_code_for_group_id (Group_id_version_lifecycle_state, lifecycle_state.defining_code)
